text:
I think the critical thing is not so much the length of the talk but the number of talks in a session. 2 talks and then disband, and everyone will go home thinking about them. 30 talks, and who knows what anybody remembers.

I've mostly soured on lightning talks for this reason. I occasionally do them for completely new audiences. But when it's people I already know, what's the point?
